org.panthercode.arctic.core.io

Class IOUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.panthercode.arctic.core.io.IOUtils

  • public class IOUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utils class that contains a set of functions to deal with files.

      • readTextFileAsList

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> readTextFileAsList(java.lang.String path)
                                                           throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                                                  java.io.IOException
        Reads a text file completely and store the content in a list. For each line in the file one entry is added to list.
        Parameters:
        path - path to file
        Returns:
        Returns a List with file content.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Is thrown if path is null.
        java.io.IOException - Is thrown if an error occurs while reading the file.

        Parameters:

      • writeTextFile

        public static void writeTextFile(java.lang.String path,
                                 java.util.Collection<? extends java.lang.String> content)
                          throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                 java.io.IOException
        Writes a list of strings in a specific file. Each list entry is one line in file.
        Parameters:
        path - path to file
        content - list with Strings to store in file
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Is thrown if path is null.
        java.io.IOException - Is thrown if an error occurs while writing in file.
